description: An asynchronous background job processing system using Redis, PostgreSQL, and Docker Compose. Jobs are created via REST API, queued in Redis, processed by a worker, and tracked using database-backed job status with retry support.
how_to_run: Use `docker compose up -d` from the project root. Then create jobs via POST http://localhost:3000/jobs and check status via GET http://localhost:3000/jobs/{job_id}.
features: REST API for job creation and status tracking

services.app: API service for job creation and querying
